verses.text: Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* there this \w word|strong="H1697"\w*,

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, that \w sittest|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, thou, and thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* in by these \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*:

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w Execute|strong="H6213"\w* ye \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, and \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* the \w spoiled|strong="H1497"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w oppressor|strong="H6216"\w*: and do no \w wrong|strong="H3238"\w*, do no \w violence|strong="H2554"\w* to the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, nor the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, neither \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

For if ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w indeed|strong="H6213"\w*, then shall there enter \w in|strong="H0935"\w* by the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* in \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and on \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, he, and his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 22.4 \ft upon…: Heb. for David upon his throne\f*

But if ye will not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, I \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by myself, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall become a \w desolation|strong="H2723"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; Thou \add art\add* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* unto me, \add and\add* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*: \add yet\add* surely I will \w make|strong="H7896"\w* thee a \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \add and\add* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add which\add* are not \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*.

And I will \w prepare|strong="H6942"\w* \w destroyers|strong="H7843"\w* against thee, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* with his \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w*: and they shall cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* thy \w choice|strong="H4005"\w* \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \add them\add* into the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

And \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* by this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, Wherefore hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* thus unto this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*?

Then they shall \w answer|strong="H0559"\w*, Because they have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* them.

¶ \w Weep|strong="H1058"\w* ye not for the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, neither \w bemoan|strong="H5110"\w* him: \add but\add* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w sore|strong="H1058"\w* for him that goeth \w away|strong="H1980"\w*: for he shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* no more, nor \w see|strong="H7200"\w* his \w native|strong="H4138"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w touching|strong="H0413"\w* \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, which \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* instead of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, which went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*; He shall not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* thither any more:

But he shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* whither they have led him \w captive|strong="H1540"\w*, and shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* no more.

¶ \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* unto him that \w buildeth|strong="H1129"\w* his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and his \w chambers|strong="H5944"\w* by \w wrong|strong="H4941"\w*; \add that\add* useth his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w service|strong="H5647"\w* without \w wages|strong="H2600"\w*, and \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* him not for his \w work|strong="H6467"\w*;

That \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w build|strong="H1129"\w* me a \w wide|strong="H4060"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* and \w large|strong="H7304"\w* \w chambers|strong="H5944"\w*, and cutteth him \w out|strong="H7167"\w* \w windows|strong="H2474"\w*; and \add it is\add* \w cieled|strong="H5603"\w* with \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*, and \w painted|strong="H4886"\w* with \w vermilion|strong="H8350"\w*.\f + \fr 22.14 \ft large: Heb. through-aired\f*\f + \fr 22.14 \ft windows: or, my windows\f*

Shalt thou \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, because thou \w closest|strong="H8474"\w* \add thyself\add* in \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*? did not thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*, \add and\add* then \add it was\add* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* with him?

He \w judged|strong="H1777"\w* the \w cause|strong="H1779"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*; then \add it was\add* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \add with him: was\add* not this to \w know|strong="H1847"\w* me? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

But thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* and thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add are\add* not but for thy \w covetousness|strong="H1215"\w*, and for to \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and for \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w*, and for \w violence|strong="H4835"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 22.17 \ft violence: or, incursion\f*

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* concerning \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; They shall not \w lament|strong="H5594"\w* for him, \add saying\add*, \w Ah|strong="H1945"\w* my \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*! or, \w Ah|strong="H1945"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*! they shall not \w lament|strong="H5594"\w* for him, \add saying\add*, \w Ah|strong="H1945"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*! or, \w Ah|strong="H1945"\w* his \w glory|strong="H1935"\w*!

He shall be \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* with the \w burial|strong="H6900"\w* of an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, \w drawn|strong="H5498"\w* and cast \w forth|strong="H7993"\w* \w beyond|strong="H1973"\w* the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, and \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*; and lift \w up|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, and \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* from the \w passages|strong="H5676"\w*: for all thy \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* are \w destroyed|strong="H7665"\w*.

I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee in thy \w prosperity|strong="H7962"\w*; \add but\add* thou \w saidst|strong="H0559"\w*, I will not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*. This \add hath been\add* thy \w manner|strong="H1870"\w* from thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, that thou \w obeyedst|strong="H8085"\w* not my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.\f + \fr 22.21 \ft prosperity: Heb. prosperities\f*

The \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* shall eat \w up|strong="H7462"\w* all thy \w pastors|strong="H7462"\w*, and thy \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*: surely then shalt thou be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* and \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w* for all thy \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*.

O \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, that makest thy \w nest|strong="H7077"\w* in the \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*, how \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* shalt thou be when \w pangs|strong="H2256"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon thee, the \w pain|strong="H2427"\w* as of a woman in \w travail|strong="H3205"\w*!\f + \fr 22.23 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*

\add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, though \w Coniah|strong="H3659"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* were the \w signet|strong="H2368"\w* upon my \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, yet would I \w pluck|strong="H5423"\w* thee thence;

And I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of them that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add of them\add* whose \w face|strong="H6440"\w* thou \w fearest|strong="H3016"\w*, even into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*.

And I will cast thee \w out|strong="H2904"\w*, and thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* that \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* thee, into \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, where ye were not \w born|strong="H3205"\w*; and there shall ye \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

But to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whereunto they \w desire|strong="H5375"\w* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, thither shall they not \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.\f + \fr 22.27 \ft desire: Heb. lift up their mind\f*

\add Is\add* this \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w Coniah|strong="H3659"\w* a \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* \w broken|strong="H5310"\w* \w idol|strong="H6089"\w*? \add is he\add* a \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* wherein \add is\add* no \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w*? wherefore are they cast \w out|strong="H7993"\w*, he and his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, and are \w cast|strong="H2904"\w* into a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not?
O \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w Write|strong="H3789"\w* ye this \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w childless|strong="H6185"\w*, a \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \add that\add* shall not \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w* in his \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: for no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* shall \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*, \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w ruling|strong="H4910"\w* any more in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.
